name: Cubyy
description:
Cubyy is a fast high-score game!

Scoring a new high-score means having fun!

I started developing it in October 2017. After a big break I continued this project.
It is still in Development and is getting new updates.
Now it has only three PowerUps, but more are following. Also new obstacles will come in the future updates.

Play it and have fun!! I would appreciate ideas and feedback!
